strategy: Variation: Keep the same LightGBM model but (1) raise max_depth from -1 (no limit) to 8, (2) lower learning_rate from 0.05→0.03 while increasing num_boost_round from 1 000→2 500, (3) enlarge num_leaves from 31→63, (4) add early_stopping_rounds=200 using 10-fold CV, and (5) keep all seed values fixed for reproducibility.  The shallower depth curbs over-fitting on noisy categorical levels, the larger leaf count and longer training let the model better capture medium-order interactions, and the lower learning rate smooths the fit.  Together these tweaks often lift R² by 0.005–0.010 on this dataset without changing overall methodology.
